name: MY21
0:
”Alexa, open MY 21.”
”Alexa, start MY 21.”
”Alexa, tell MY 21 to restart the game.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: my twenty one
Developer Terms of Use
des:
MY21 is an interactive game that helps players build good habits by motivating them to spend 20 minutes a day for 21 days practicing an activity of their choice. 

Some use MY21 to introduce regular workouts or meditation, others - to try something completely new (painting, coding) or finally finish an online course started a year ago. 

20 minutes is your minimum. If you feel like spending more - please do, but don’t tire yourself - the game objective is to complete 21 active days.

You’ll play with a virtual guide, Sam, sharing reports once your daily activity is complete. If you don’t check in, the game will automatically restart from Day #1.

MY21 can also track your energy levels throughout the 21-day cycle. Your responses will be summed up in a convenient report at the end of the game & never shared with anyone but you. 

Got it? Then let’s begin!

HOW TO USE:

1. Ask Alexa to “Open MY 21”.

2. Tell MY21 what you want to do & start the game.

3. During the next 21 day, dedicate at least 20 minutes a day to the chosen Activity.

4. Share daily reports with MY21 - with or without reminder. 

5. (Optionally): share your daily energy levels to receive a summary report at the end.

The game objective is to complete 21 active days.

Please remember: If you don't report in, the game will restart from day #1.

SUPPORT AND FEEDBACK

MY21 is in active development. If there's anything we can do to make it better, please email Alex at Alex@2021.works - your candid feedback is super important to us!
 
If you like MY21, we'd really appreciate it if you'd leave a review and, perhaps, recommend us to a friend. 

www.2021.works
www.instagram.com/2021.stories
